name: Flock of Ducks (jonas1426)
description:
Based on a Godot Wild Jam #24 submission, Flock of Ducks is an expanded version of the 2D top-down puzzle game about leading a Duck and her ducklings around grasslands solving relaxing puzzles and working as a team to get back home.

In this revamped version, you can expect reworked controls for better Duck and Duckling handeling as well as new music and even more puzzles to enjoy.

Controls:

WASD/ Arrow Keys

Shift - Toggle between Duck and Ducklings

Space - Tell the Ducklings to stay in place or call them back to you

Credits:

Music: Shane Chauhan

Project Manager: GrapefruitChili (ldrg)

Game Design & Level Design: GrapefruitChili (ldrg)

Audio/SFX: GrapefruitChili (ldrg)

Programmer: Jonas

GUI/UI: Jonas

Art: Jonas
